forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain this afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Low 54F. Winds SE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the morning, then mostly cloudy with light rain possible late. High 14C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the morning, then mostly cloudy with light rain possible late. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with occasional rain...mainly in the evening. Low around 10C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of wind driven rain early. Remaining cloudy late. Low around 50F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 47F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
